extension.name: XML Importer
extension.description: From XML to entries in an instant

releases.release: - Fix issues with XPath and namespaces - Add `$entry_id` to `prepareImportValue` function - Added README information about the `prepareImportValue` function - Use the unique Duplicator (where available) to improve the UX - Tiny performance enhancements
- Updated to be compatible with Symphony 2.2 - Improved validation by adding an XPath validator. - Improved handling of automatic namespace fetching.
